original_text: if somebody was bored and . . . decided to make a dull , pretentious version of jesus' son , they'd come up with something like bart freundlich's world traveler .
generated_text:
1. "The cinematic equivalent of a sedative, 'The Lost Weekend' is a snooze-fest that fails to engage on any level."
